name: Minigolf (itch) (JackB123) (JackB123)
description:
Play a fun minigolf game with easy controls and enjoyable gameplay!

Includes:

- An easy nine hole golf course.

- A difficult nine hole golf course

- Simple and easy to learn controls.

How to play the game:

- Click and drag the the cursor in the opposite direction you want to go, and the ball will shoot forward. The more you drag back the more power the ball will have and the faster it will go.
